pullRequest.title: Add API to make it easier to write method interceptors and support Kotlin suspend functions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added util classes to work with Kotlin's suspend functions in MethodInterceptors and implemented to use it with @Retryable.
It should be possible to implement other interceptors like micronaut-projects/micronaut-cache#183.
Personally I'm not a Kotlin user just found it interesting.

nodes.bodyText: Think it would be more efficient to use getParameterValues() and check the array since this will not build the MutableArgumentValue objects and there is no requirement here to use the MutableArgumentValue interface
Same thing here I thin you can use getParameterValues() as well

beforeCommit.message: Support Kotlin suspend functions in MethodInterceptors

afterCommit.message: Support Kotlin suspend functions in MethodInterceptors

nodes.bodyText: Does this need to public? Probably needs renaming too
